content.question: Which of the following is in the melodic minor mode?

choices.label: The figure presents three measures of music in treble clef. The key signature has two flats and the time signature is 9/8.
The figure presents three measures of music in treble clef. The key signature has two flats and the time signature is 9/8.
The figure presents three measures of music in treble clef. The key signature has two flats and the time signature is 9/8.
The figure presents three measures of music in treble clef. The key signature has two flats and the time signature is 9/8.

content.answer: The figure presents three measures of music in treble clef. The key signature has two flats and the time signature is 9/8.

unit.text: 2: Music Fundamentals II - Minor Scales and Key Signatures, Melody, Timbre, and Texture

topic.text: 2.1: Minor Scales - Natural, Harmonic, and Melodic

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Use symbols and terms to describe features of pitch in notated music, including pitch patterns and relationships, melodic features, chords, harmonic progressions, and cadences.
